channel.title: Displaying picture of player? [Rep++] [317] [Delta]
channel.description:
i'm using Delta, 317.
well, i'm trying to make a public void playerTalk. and it's supposed to be like the public void talk and public void talk2 exept, playerTalk is gonna be for when the player speaks, not when the NPC speaks. I did everything perfect, exept one thing.. in the talk where it displays the NPC head animation, i need it too display the player's head instead. Here is the code i'm using to display the player's head (currently not working!) [code]sendFrame75(player, 4901);[/code]

item.title: Displaying picture of player? [Rep++] [317] [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

i’m using Delta, 317.

well, i’m trying to make a public void playerTalk.
and it’s supposed to be like the public void talk and public void talk2 exept, playerTalk is gonna be for when the player speaks, not when the NPC speaks. I did everything perfect, exept one thing… in the talk where it displays the NPC head animation, i need it too display the player’s head instead. Here is the code i’m using to display the player’s head (currently not working!)

sendFrame75(player, 4901);

Read full topic
